title: The Commission for Regulation of Utilities in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Electricity Regulation Act, 1999
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Electricity Regulation Act, 1999 

(Water) Levy Order 2024. 

(2) This Order shall come into operation on 31 December 2024. 

(3) The Electricity Regulation Act, 1999 (Water) Levy Order 2023 (S.I. No. 

597 of 2023) is revoked as and from 1 January 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited electricity regulation act 1999 (water) levy order 2024 (2) order shall come operation 31 december 2024 (3) electricity regulation act 1999 (water) levy order 2023 (s.i no 597 2023) revoked 1 january 2025

title: The Commission for Regulation of Utilities in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: In this Order—
text_raw:
3. 

In this Order— 

(a) 

all words and expressions defined in the Act or in the Water 
Services Acts 2007 to 2013 shall have the same meanings when 
used in this Order and where in any case a word or expression 
used in this Order is defined in each of the Act and the Water 
Services Acts 2007 to 2013, the word or expression shall have the 
meaning given to it by the Water Services Acts 2007 to 2013 for 
the purposes of this Order; 

(b) 

a reference to legislation is a reference to that legislation as 
amended from time to time; 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th December, 2024.

(c) 

(d) 

a reference to an article or schedule is to an article of, or schedule 
to, this Order; and 

a reference to a sub-article is to the sub-article of the provision in 
which the reference occurs.

title: The Commission for Regulation of Utilities in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: 4. This Order shall apply to the class of water service undertaking set out in
text_raw:
4. This Order shall apply to the class of water service undertaking set out in 

the Schedule to this Order (“relevant undertaking”).
text_norm: 4 order shall apply class water service undertaking set schedule order ( relevant undertaking )

title: The Commission for Regulation of Utilities in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: 5. (1) A levy of € 4,147,510 is hereby imposed on the relevant undertaking.
text_raw:
5. (1) A levy of € 4,147,510 is hereby imposed on the relevant undertaking. 

(2) The levy imposed by sub-article (1) shall be payable in respect of each 
period and in each case no later than the day which is 30 days after the date on 
which a request for payment of the levy instalment is made by the Commission. 

(3) The amount of the levy imposed on a relevant undertaking in respect of 

any period shall be a fixed payment of € 1,036,877.50.
text_norm: 5 (1) levy eur 4 147 510 hereby imposed relevant undertaking (2) levy imposed sub-article (1) shall payable respect period case later day 30 day date request payment levy instalment made commission (3) amount levy imposed relevant undertaking respect period shall fixed payment eur 1 036 877.50

title: The Commission for Regulation of Utilities in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: 6. (1) Where any amount falling to be paid under Article 5 is not paid within
text_raw:
6. (1) Where any amount falling to be paid under Article 5 is not paid within 
the period for payment specified in Article 5, interest thereon shall accrue at the 
prescribed interest rate compounded monthly from the date when such payment 
is due until the same is made. 

(2) In this Regulation, "the prescribed interest rate" means a rate 2% per 

annum above the Euribor rate.
text_norm: 6 (1) amount falling paid article 5 paid within period payment specified article 5 interest thereon shall accrue prescribed interest rate compounded monthly date payment due made (2) regulation prescribed interest rate mean rate 2 per annum euribor rate

title: The Commission for Regulation of Utilities in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: 7. (1) All payments shall be made in Euro on the due date by direct bank
text_raw:
7. (1) All payments shall be made in Euro on the due date by direct bank 

transfer or equivalent instantaneous transfer of funds to the bank 
account specified by the Commission. 

(2) Relevant undertakings shall notify the Commission as soon as payment 
has been made, indicating the date on which payment was made and the name 
of the bank effecting payment. 

(3) A request for payment by the Commission to the relevant undertakings 
under this Order shall be made to the relevant undertaking in accordance with 
Section 4 of the Act. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [670]

title: The Commission for Regulation of Utilities in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: The relevant undertaking for the purposes of this Levy Order is a class consisting
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

The relevant undertaking for the purposes of this Levy Order is a class consisting 
of: 

Uisce Éireann (formerly Irish Water), a water service undertaking established 
under the Water Services Act 2013 and empowered to charge for the provision 
of water services under the Water Services (No. 2) Act 2013. 

Sealed with the common seal of the Commission for 
Regulation of Utilities on 4 December, 2024. 

JIM GANNON, 

Chairperson of the Commission. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [670] 5

title: The Commission for Regulation of Utilities in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order imposes a levy on a certain specified class of water service 
undertaking, for the purpose of meeting expenses properly incurred by the 
Commission for Regulation of Utilities in the discharge of its functions under 
the Act, the Water Act, and the Act of 2013.
